chart_description: This chart shows the compressed traffic between sites for the Directory Replication Agent (DRA) in bytes per second. The inbound dimension represents the traffic coming into the site from other sites, while the outbound dimension represents the traffic leaving the site to other sites.

dimension_descriptions.inbound: The amount of compressed traffic coming into the site from other sites in bytes per second.
dimension_descriptions.outbound: The amount of compressed traffic leaving the site to other sites in bytes per second.
